data.label: zipalign
data.description: zipalign 是一种 zip 归档文件对齐工具，有助于确保归档文件中的所有未压缩文件相对于文件开头对齐。这样一来，您便可直接通过 mmap(2) 访问这些文件，而无需在 RAM 中复制这些数据并减少了应用的内存用量，zipalign 使用了4字节的边界对齐方式来映射内存，通过空间换时间的方式提高执行效率。在将 APK 文件分发给最终用户之前，先使用 zipalign 进行优化。

data.label: zipalign
data.description: zipalign is a zip archive alignment tool that helps ensure all uncompressed files in the archive are aligned relative to the start of the file. This allows you to access these files directly through mmap(2) without copying this data into RAM, reducing the application's memory usage. zipalign uses 4-byte boundary alignment to map memory, improving execution efficiency by trading space for time. Optimize your APK files with zipalign before distributing them to end users.
